snippet.title: STAYiNG at a CURSED MOTEL!!  Adley Niko and Friends solve a Mystery on Roblox! Trick or Treat
snippet.description:
NEVER staying in this motel EVER again!

JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

HEY EVERYBODY!! Welcome back to G for Gaming, your one stop shop for the best and most fun gaming videos on YouTube! Today things are getting a little spooky around here! With Halloween coming soon, we've been getting into the spooky spirit! For this episode, we all dressed up in some fun... and spooky, costumes! Adley dressed up as a dragon-cowboy-princess? Whatever that is! Niko dresses as a cultist from 99 Nights in the Forest, Navey dressed as a witch and Dad... well he dressed up as... Banana Bowser? What?! We invited our friends to join us while we jump into some scary roblox games together! First up we played Cheese Escape! This game was a lot funnier than it was scary, we had to run around a maze that was made out of cheese and try to find pieces of cheese and keys to escape before this giant rat would try and get us! We only played for a little bit before we tried this other spooky game called Midnight Motel! In this game, we all checked into this creepy looking motel together and instantly, strange and mysterious things started happening! We did eventually beat it and survive all the way through all of the spookiness!

We have more Halloween videos coming soon so stay tuned for when those come out even closer to Halloween!

Thanks for Watching!! BYE! PSSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHH

enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video:  ADLEY sets a TRAP for DELiVERY DAD!! my Secret Plan to ask for your Mail, thanks for Art & Letters
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zaH6iBAuCcY


this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
